titleStmt.title: Profitable charity a sermon preached before the right honourable Sir Thomas Lane, Lord Mayor of London, and the honourable Court of Aldermen, &c. at the parish-church of St. Brides, on Easter-Monday, 1695 / by Robert Lord Bishop of Chichester.
titleStmt.author: Grove, Robert, 1634-1696.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
